mapper.select: select members.name, company.name as company_name from members left join company on company.member_id = members.id where id=#{id}
SELECT count(*) FROM apply where created_at between concat(current_date, '00:00:00') AND concat(current_date, '23:59:59') AND status='승인 대기'
SELECT count(*) FROM sale where sale_approved='승인 대기'
SELECT count(*) FROM orders where delivery_status='미발송'
SELECT count(*) FROM apply where updated_at between concat(current_date, '00:00:00') AND concat(current_date, '23:59:59') AND status='승인 완료'
SELECT count(*) FROM sale where sale_approved='승인 완료'
SELECT count(*) FROM orders where delivery_status='발송 완료'
SELECT SUM(total_price) AS total_sum, count(*) as total_count FROM orders

SELECT sub_category.sub_category_seq, sub_category.sub_category_name, COALESCE(COUNT(orders.order_seq), 0) AS order_count FROM sub_category LEFT JOIN apply ON sub_category.sub_category_seq = apply.sub_category_seq LEFT JOIN orders ON apply.application_seq = orders.application_seq GROUP BY sub_category.sub_category_seq, sub_category.sub_category_name
